items.sentence: They differed with each other on the care and upbringing of their children.

I won't force you to do that, but if you don't, there will be consequences.
Admitting that there is a problem is the first step to solving the problem.
Mary will never lose weight because she is incapable of sticking to a diet.
When Tom found out that there was no chance of escaping, he killed himself.
From the direction that he was going in, I would say he was headed to town.
Many people believe that Tom and Mary are secretly in love with each other.
I hope that we can avoid making the same stupid mistakes we made last time.
Tom is worried about Mary since he hasn't heard from her since last Monday.
